page.title: 04CHINA CLAY EXTRACTION
page.content: China Clay is extracted by{washing it out of the granite with remotely controlled, high-powered hoses. Huge lorries remove the large stones while bulldozers and dynamiting continually expose new pit faces. The stream of clay, micaceous waste and sand flows to the lowest level of the pit where it is pumped to a{separation}plant. There the coarse sand is taken away to the sand tips. The remaining constituents are taken to separators where more waste is removed and the slurry taken to {dewatering}tanks. Now the clay undergoes complex{refining}to remove the last of the mica, sand, and other impurities. Then the different grades of clay are{blended}to the needs of the customer. The process is completed when the slurry is{dried.}
